WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has been open for 30+ days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with current files and references to the versions affected.
WorkItem.Description: The proc effect of the Illustration of the Dragon Soul trinket isn't getting counted in anyway for shadowpriests (maybe this extends into more classes) and the trinket is made useless in the DPS calculations.
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Illustration of the Dragon Soul not working

Comments.Message: I know, I'm planning on getting this fixed for next release. As a quick temporary fix, you can edit this item and set its spellpower to 200.
